org.lwjgl.glfw

Class GLFWMonitorCallback

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.lwjgl.system.Pointer.Default
      • org.lwjgl.system.libffi.Closure
        • org.lwjgl.system.libffi.Closure.V
          • org.lwjgl.glfw.GLFWMonitorCallback
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Pointer

    public abstract class GLFWMonitorCallback
extends Closure.V
    Instances of this interface may be passed to the GLFW.glfwSetMonitorCallback(org.lwjgl.glfw.GLFWMonitorCallback) method.

    • Method Detail

      • invoke

        public abstract void invoke(long monitor,
                            int event)
        Will be called when a monitor is connected to or disconnected from the system.
        Parameters:
        monitor - the monitor that was connected or disconnected
        event - one of GLFW.GLFW_CONNECTED or GLFW.GLFW_DISCONNECTED

      • create

        public static GLFWMonitorCallback create(GLFWMonitorCallback.SAM sam)
        Creates a GLFWMonitorCallback that delegates the callback to the specified functional interface.
        Parameters:
        sam - the delegation target
        Returns:
        the GLFWMonitorCallback instance

      • set

        public GLFWMonitorCallback set()
        See SetMonitorCallback.
